goals =
    gather weather data for cities inside of a set of coords (lat , lon)
    
    calculate from the gathered data =
        - highest/lowest/avg for =
            - max/min/current temp & feels like
            - humidity
        
        - cloud coverage
        - avg visibility
        - wind speed
        - pressure
        
        
        

USA lat/lng constraints :
    lat = 19.50139 to 64.85694 
    lng = -161.75583 to -68.01197
